QuestData.Title: Nethergarde Needs You!
QuestData.Description: Nethergarde needs you, $c! I have been sent here by Quartermaster Lungertz to head off Okrilla's nefarious lackeys and to recruit able-bodied heroes of the Alliance! Help us fight off the Horde!$B$BIf you are willing, take this portal in front of me to the Blasted Lands and speak with the quartermaster.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Quartermaster Lungertz at Nethergarde Keep in Blasted Lands.
